name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Slidell

reviews.text: There are two ways to judge this property: by the locality -and its competition- and by the chain itself. Slidell wise: business travelers this is your hotel. Quality wise, as a entire package, the rooms, amenities, breakfast and dinner, it really is the best Slidell has to offer.
reviews.title: A review from a longer term stay business traveler

reviews.text: However chain wise from a national scale it's above average for a Homewood Suites. The best thing going for the property is its new and clean. The rooms are spacious and well appointed. But on the down side the closet space is like something you'd find at a Hotel Six with rickety sliding mirror doors that always seemed to jam. The HVAC was the louder in window mounted style -not something you'd expect from a newer Homewood- with two wall mounted thermostats.
reviews.title: OUTSTANDING! And I rarely say that

reviews.text: The meals over all were good. The evening meals had a great variety including some cajun favorites. The breakfasts were average with fairly good variety but the scrambled eggs were always overcooked and dry.
reviews.title: Placed next to elevator.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The staff was was always very professional and friendly!
reviews.title: Top Notch Customer Service

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The in-room internet service, both cabled and wifi, was frequently slow and frustrating. Even over the weekends when the hotel had far fewer guests. Spotty performance for email and light web browsing, I wouldn't count on it for VPN usage.
reviews.title: A Nice Surprise !

reviews.text: A very nice hotel although it is several miles from I10 and seemed a bit out of the way to me. The staff was very friendly and helpful. It is very clean and is decorated nicely. They have a nice breakfast buffet in the morning.
reviews.title: A nice place to stay in Slidell...

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I would stay here again if I am in the area and would recommend it to anyone.
reviews.title: EXCELLENT!!!!!

reviews.text: Our stay at this Homewood Suite was excellent!! The service was GREAT, the rooms was extremely clean.
reviews.title: Unbelievable Hospitality

reviews.text: We didnot have any problems we did stay 5 nights. We didnot want to leave, it is a home away from home. We defintely would stay again. The best hotel-suite, we have ever stayed in!! Keep up the GREAT work!! Thanks for the hospitality!!!
reviews.title: First time at a Homewood Suites

reviews.text: We were displaced from our home due to hurricane Isaac. We stayed at this property with our 3 children for about 1month. From the first day until the last, the ENTIRE staff treated us as VIP's. Valerie always took time to speak with us and ensure our stay was the best it could be. The exceptional part of this is that all of the guests were treated in the same manner. No wonder they stay busy. The property was impeccably maintained. We will definitely make the Homewood our first choice next time.
reviews.title: Outstanding!

reviews.text: Really Hilton? You can do better with the Homewood brand.
reviews.title: Nice hotel ... awful breakfast

reviews.text: Having stayed in 4 Hilton properties over the past 14 days (all Hamptons) I can say the brand let me down on this stay. The hotel itself is very nice, good location and very well kept. They cut corners on the showers and closets, but overall King room layout is nice.
reviews.title: Not a bad hotel, but a rough night.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The breakfast experience was terrible. The offering and presentation were so far below this brand I was quite surprised. No prepared oatmeal?! Microwave packaged oatmeal ... really? And a 4 slot, incredibly slow toaster ... hate to have to navigate a really hectic crowd. Juice glasses the size of a large thimble? If you're going to offer fruit try having a good selection and variety in the bowl.
reviews.title: Romantic Getaway--- Amazing Hotel, I say #1!!!!

reviews.text: All of the Hampton properties I stayed at in the last 14 days offered a far superior breakfast experience than this property. I was expecting better.
reviews.title: "I'll be back"

reviews.text: I asked for a quiet room, and they put me in a room next to the elevator. When I say "next to the elevator," I mean that you literally share a wall with the elevator car. Also happens to be the wall with your bed against it, so the elevator sounds like it's moving about 2-3 feet away from your pillow. Terrible design, very disruptive. When I tried to change rooms, the woman at the front desk told me they were sold out and that the only other available room was . . . you guessed it . . . next to another elevator.
reviews.title: Hands down the best hotel in Slidell

reviews.text: We always stay at this hotel because it never disappoints!! Always very clean, quiet and the perfect location. The Manager is awesome and the front desk is by far the best at what they do! Very friendly and helpful. We feel like we are "home away from home" when we stay with them. Great breakfast every morning too!
reviews.title: EXCELLENT!!! Service by far the best.

reviews.text: Thank you for always providing the best of everything! We look forward to staying with you again soon!
reviews.title: Overall Excellent

reviews.text: Great overall experience with this hotel. I would recommend this hotel and chain at any time. Staff was freindly,very clean hotel, best price in town for super bowl weekend in New Orleans.
reviews.title: Clean and Comfortable

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Location is excellent if you want a piece and quiet from the city of New Orleans. The hotel is surrounded by stores and a mall so very convenience for everything.
reviews.title: Wonderful

reviews.text: Very well run with a great staff we where there for the Super Bowl and most importantly the Baltimore Ravens won!! The room are large and well appointed. The fitness center was clean and well kept. The breakfast was great.
reviews.title: Very nice.. very clean.

description: Nestled on the Northshore of Lake Pontchartrain, the Homewood Suites by Hilton Slidell is the area's ideal choice for both short and extended stay. The all suite upscale accommodations provide guests with the feeling of being home while traveling. Enjoy the complimentary full hot breakfast and Welcome Home Reception Mon-Thurs. Rest assured, you will enjoy all the comforts of Home!
